sentences.sentence: This reminder did not hearten the servants much; they still held back.
sentences.translation: 这个提示并没有使仆人们振作起来；他们仍然踌躇不前。

sentences.sentence: He said a lot to hearten me.
sentences.translation: 他对我说了许多鼓励的话。

sentences.sentence: This good news will hearten you.
sentences.translation: 这个好消息会使你振作起来。
